title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 158.4 - Applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 158.4 - Applications

State Regulations

Each board of education or board of cooperative educational
services which seeks a grant shall submit to the commissioner, by April first
of the school year preceding the school year for which the grant will be
awarded pursuant to this Part, an application setting forth a description of a
proposed education and community renewal program; a plan for expansion of an
existing program; or a description of a proposed training program to enable an
applicant to establish an education and community renewal program; provided
that for the 1986-87 school year, such application may be submitted on or
before October 30, 1986. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
158.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
